credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Set Shop: 9:44/ 10:02
description: In this design of an advertisement, a column on the left under the heading 9:44, imprinted in bold red type, is a list of supplies in a handwritten style, margins unjustified. In a column on the right, under the heading 10:02, the items are duplicated, each followed by a red check mark. Centered at the bottom is the Set Shop logo, comprised of a stencil-style red S within a white circle, surrounded by a circular red band imprinted with the company name, address and telephone number.
name: advertisement
